how to find a book

note: this method works for most books. If your book is too niche, you have to work some internet magic to find it (private trackers and so on)

visit unblocked-pw.github.io.

scroll all the way down to and click LibGen, select ISBN in ‚ÄúSearch in fields‚Äù, type in the ISBN of the book you want and press search

if your search turns out empty, reset ‚ÄúSearch in fields‚Äù and try searching by title and author (and if that turns out empty, you might be out of luck).

the format you‚Äôd like to download is up to you. i prioritize EPUB and PDF

EPUB is the most widely supported vendor-independent XML-based e-book format according to Wikipedia. if you have a Kindle, you have to download MOBI instead of EPUB (don‚Äôt get a Kindle; just my 2 cents)
